course_description: Theory of comparative advantage; the impact of trade on welfare and income distribution; economic analysis of trade barriers; and the analysis of international movement of labor and capital.
prerequisites: This course requires ECON 201 OR ECON_OX201 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2448, Section #: 9000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Staff, Status: Closed
